claude.summary: The refactoring is well-executed with proper backward compatibility.

findings.title: [P2] DummyOrchestrator.last_kwargs should be reset in test teardown
findings.body: The DummyOrchestrator class uses class-level state that persists across tests.

codex.summary: Factory initialization drops the review-gate disable signal.

findings.title: [P1] Propagate review-gate disable into _disabled_validations
findings.body: When the factory detects a missing review-gate it adds 'review' to its local disabled_validations set, but _init_from_config rebuilds _disabled_validations only from config.disable_validations.

gemini.summary: The refactor introduces a breaking change by displacing the primary positional argument.

findings.title: [P1] Restore MalaOrchestrator positional argument compatibility
findings.body: The refactor moved _config to the first positional argument in MalaOrchestrator.__init__, displacing repo_path.

aggregated_findings.title: [P2] DummyOrchestrator.last_kwargs should be reset in test teardown
aggregated_findings.body: The DummyOrchestrator class uses class-level state that persists across tests.

aggregated_findings.title: [P1] Propagate review-gate disable into _disabled_validations
aggregated_findings.body: When the factory detects a missing review-gate it adds 'review' to its local disabled_validations set, but _init_from_config rebuilds _disabled_validations only from config.disable_validations.

aggregated_findings.title: [P1] Restore MalaOrchestrator positional argument compatibility
aggregated_findings.body: The refactor moved _config to the first positional argument in MalaOrchestrator.__init__, displacing repo_path.
